playn.scene

Class Mouse

  • java.lang.Object
    • playn.core.Mouse
      • playn.scene.Mouse

  • public class Mouse
extends Mouse
    Integrates the layer system with mouse interactions. To receive mouse events on layers, connect the mouse event dispatcher as a global mouse listener like so: platform.input().mouseEvents.connect(new Mouse.Dispatcher(...)).

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Mouse.Dispatcher
      Handles the dispatching of mouse events to layers.
      static class  Mouse.HoverEvent
      An event dispatched when the mouse enters or exits a layer.
      static class  Mouse.Interaction
      Used to dispatch mouse interactions to layers.
      static class  Mouse.Listener
      A listener for mouse button, motion and wheel events with layer info.

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class playn.core.Mouse

        Mouse.ButtonEvent, Mouse.ButtonSlot, Mouse.Event, Mouse.MotionEvent, Mouse.MotionSlot, Mouse.WheelEvent, Mouse.WheelSlot
